decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason:  In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers:

Application form; Block Plan; (Unique plan reference: Unique plan reference: p2c/uk/704709/953868); Ground Fl Plans (Drawing number: 01); First Fl Plans (Drawing number: 02); Loft Plans (Drawing number: 03); Roof Plans (Drawing number: 04); Proposed Ground Extension (Drawing number: 05); Front Elevations (Drawing number: 06); Side Elevation (Drawing number: 07); Rear Elevations (Drawing number: 08); Section A-A' (Drawing number: 09);

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No part of the roof of the ground floor rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: External alterations to the ground floor rear addition including raising of the roof line
